    • Method Detail

      • getLastLine

        public static java.lang.String getLastLine(java.io.File file)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the last line from a given text file. This method is particularly well suited for very large text files that contain millions of text lines since it will just seek the end of the text file and seek the last line indicator. Please use only for large sized text files.
        Parameters:
        file - A file on disk
        Returns:
        The last line or an empty string if nothing was found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • tail

        public static java.lang.String tail(java.io.File file)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getLastLine

        public static java.lang.String getLastLine(java.lang.String path)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Get last line of a text file
        Parameters:
        path - The address of the file
        Returns:
        The last line or an empty string if nothing was found
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When file connection have problem

      • cleanBlankLines

        public static void cleanBlankLines(java.lang.String path)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Delete blank lines of a text file. Work best with *.txt files.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
